config.question: By the early twenty-first century, African Americans had made many social and economic gains, including __________.

choices.content: an increase in the number of black-owned businesses
migrating from the North to the Sunbelt for jobs

answer_3.response: African Americans made gains in certain areas of life. In 2010, more than 80 percent of blacks aged 25 and older had earned a high school diploma, and nearly one in five possessed a college degree. The number of black-owned businesses grew significantly.
